00001 #include <cassert>
00002 #include <iomanip>
00003 
00004 #include "TMath.h"
00005 
00006 #include "LinearFitResult.hh"
00007 
00008 
00009 namespace TBTrack {
00010 
00011   LinearFitResult::LinearFitResult(double c, int n, const TVectorD &p, const TMatrixDSym &e) :
00012     _chiSquared(c), _numberOfDof(n), _parameters(p), _errors(e) {
00013     assert(p.GetNrows()==e.GetNrows());
00014   }
00015   
00016   double LinearFitResult::chiSquared() const {
00017     return _chiSquared;
00018   }
00019 
00020   int  LinearFitResult::numberOfDof() const {
00021     return _numberOfDof;
00022   }
00023 
00024   double LinearFitResult::probability() const {
00025     return TMath::Prob(_chiSquared,_numberOfDof);
00026   }
00027   
00028   const TVectorD& LinearFitResult::parameters() const {
00029     return _parameters;
00030   }
00031   
00032   const TMatrixDSym& LinearFitResult::errors() const {
00033     return _errors;
00034   }
00035 
00036   double LinearFitResult::probability(const TVectorD &p) const {
00037     assert(p.GetNrows()==_parameters.GetNrows());
00038     return TMath::Prob((_parameters-p)*(_errors*(_parameters-p)),p.GetNrows());
00039   }
00040   
00041   std::ostream& LinearFitResult::print(std::ostream &o, const std::string &s) const {
00042     o << s << "TBTrack::LinearFitResult::print()" << std::endl;
00043     
00044     o << " Chi-squared/NumberOfDof = " << std::setw(13)
00045       << _chiSquared << "/" << _numberOfDof
00046       << ", probability = " << std::setw(8) << probability() << std::endl;
00047      
00048     o << s << " Parameters" << std::endl;
00049     for(int i(0);i<_parameters.GetNrows();i++) {
00050       o << std::setw(13) << _parameters(i);
00051     }
00052     o << std::endl;
00053 
00054     o << s << " Error matrix";
00055     for(int i(0);i<_errors.GetNrows();i++) {
00056       for(int j(0);j<_errors.GetNcols();j++) {
00057         o << std::setw(13) << _errors(i,j);
00058       }
00059       o << std::endl;
00060     }
00061 
00062     return o;
00063   }
00064 
00065 }
